@description.name: @description
@description.body: Update the layer to display a different window of the virtual grid. This method is called if the pane is scrolled, resized or cells are prefetched. The implementation can assume that no other grid data has been changed since the last "fullUpdate" of "updateLayerWindow" call. Note: This method can only be called after the widgets initial appear event has been fired because it may work with the widget's DOM elements.
